For more than three years Miguel has had an exhaust and radiator repair shop in a central location.  He is well recommended by his customers for being honest, hardworking, and responsible.  He guarantees all his jobs and for this his customers recommend him to others, and so his list of customers has grown.

Miguel wants to cover the requests they make and for this he needs more materials such as solder, adhesive, polish, aluminum, thinner, and new soldering equipment since what he has now doesn't work well anymore.

He hopes to count on the help of INTEGRAL so his business can get ahead and to be able to continue helping support his siblings and their studies.

loans.use: to buy materials such as solder, adhesive, polish, aluminum, thinner, and new soldering equipment since what he has now doesn't work well anymore.

loans.name: Rosa Aura

texts.es:
Rosa 51 años, una mujer trabajadora que tiene aspiraciones de crecimiento de su negocio.
Su negocio es una tienda de víveres, la cual está ubicada en la parte delantera de su vivienda.
Inicio este negocio con n capital, gracias a Dios ha ido mejorando económicamente.
Esta actividad la realiza con su hija, su horario es de lunes a domingo, desde las 6:00am hasta las 20:00pm.
Está casada, su esposo es un maestro de construcción.
Tiene una hija de 14 años, estudia en escuela pública.
Ella solicita el préstamo para invertir más en negocio y la compra de víveres como: arroz, aceites, azúcar, huevos, etc.
Su sueño es terminar su casa.
texts.en:
Rosa, 51, is a hard-working lady who aspires to growing her business.  She has a grocery store set up in the front part of her house, which she started little capital.  Fortunately it has gone well economically.

She works with her daughter Monday through Sunday from 6:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.   Her husband is a superintendent of construction and her 14-year-old daughter studies at the public school.

She is requesting a loan to invest in the business by purchasing groceries such as rice, oil, sugar, eggs, etc.

Her dream is to finish her house.

loans.use: To buy groceries such as rice, oil, sugar, eggs, etc.

loans.name: Santo Domingo Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SANTO DOMINGO” iniciará su primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro de Villa Adela, está compuesta por seis integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Juana. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: trenzado de mantas, venta de verduras, tejido para mantas, macramé, tienda de barrio.

La señora Juana  indica que este es el primer ciclo que trabaja con Pro Mujer, ingresando por invitación de una promotora. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tejido de bolsas con la técnica de macramé que viene trabajando hace veinte años atrás, aprendiendo este oficio de su mamá 

El crédito que ahora sacará es para aumentar su capital (compra una hilo cola de rata) que comprará de las ferias y posterior a la elaboración lo comercializará a pedido. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia pues ella es casada  y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los intereses y los ahorros.
texts.en:
The communal bank "SANTO DOMINGO" will begin its first term with Pro Mujer, which is run at the Villa Adela Center.  The group is comprised of six members and led by a management board presided over by Mrs. Juana.  The businesses of the members of the communal bank are varried and include: blanket braiding, vegetable sales, blanket weaving, macramé and running a neighborhood store.

Mrs. Juana says that this is her first term working with Pro Mujer and she joined by invitation from another member.  Currently she runs a macramé bag weaving business.  She has been working for 20 years and learned the skill from her mother.

The loan she is requesting is to increase her capital (to buy rattail cord at the fairs) so she can make her products and fill orders.  This type of job allows her to earn an income and help support her family.  She is married and has four children.

When asked why she likes Pro Mujer, she responds that the interest rate and savings are good.

loans.use: To buy cord.

loans.name: Carlos Genaro

texts.es: Carlos, de Esteli, agricultor,tiene 33 anos de edad, es casado, tiene 3 hijos, se dedica a la agricultura desde hace mas de 20 anos, originario de la comarca Namanji en Esteli.Este es su segundo prestamo kiva con el primero sembro cebolla y chiltomas para desafortunadamente los precios en lo mercados de las cebollas cayeron pero el sigue dia a dia levantandose desde tempranas horas de las madrugadas a sembrar pues de ello depende el su familia y es por ello que quiere volver a intentar sembrar cebolla , el requiere el prestamo para comprar insumos, fertilizantes,abono para sembrar 1 manzana de cebollas. El espera sacar una cosecha de buena calidad que pueda lograr vender  a precios justo y darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia,lo mas importante que sus hijos estudien y no se queden atras.
texts.en: Carlos, 33, is married and has three children.  Originally from the Namanji region he now lives in Esteli and has been in farming for over 20 years.  This is his second Kiva loan.  The first was used to plant onions and sweet peppers but unfortunately onion prices fell.  Every day he gets up early to work because his family depends on the income.  He wants to try to grow onions again and needs the loan to buy supplies such as fertilizer.  He will plant a "manzana" (1.68 acres) of onions.  He hopes to harvest a good crop so he can sell his produce at a decent price.  This will improve his family's quality of life and, most importantly, help his children get an education so they don't stay behind.

loans.use: To plant onions.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a set of tools for his auto repair shop.

loans.name: Jacquellin Araceli

texts.es:
Jacqueline de 47 años, una mujer trabajadora que a pesar de ser madre soltera ha sabido cómo salir adelante con la ayuda de Dios.
El negocio de ella es un taller de confesiones, trabaja sola en su taller que está ubicada en la parte delantera de su vivienda.
Su horario es de lunes a domingo, desde las 8:30am hasta las 19:30pm.
Tiene un hijo de 14 años, estudia en escuela pública.
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería como: blusas, vestidos, etc.
Su sueño es implementar y agrandar su taller con nuevas maquinas y con personal operario donde ella pueda brindar empleo.
texts.en:
Jacquellin, 47, is a hard-working lady who despite being a single mother has learned how to get ahead with God's help.  She has a sewing shop set up in the front part of her house where she works alone.  Her schedule is Monday through Sunday, 8:30 a.m. to 7:30 p.m.

She has a 14-year-old son who attends the public school.  She is requesting a loan to buy supplies to make blouses, dresses, etc.

Her dream is to expand her shop, buy new machines and hire workers to whom she can provide employment.

loans.use: To buy fabric, thread, and buttons.

loans.name: Gladys Piedad

texts.es:
Gladys de 61 años, una mujer trabajadora que tiene aspiraciones de crecimiento de negocio.
Su negocio es una tienda que está ubicada en la parte delantera de su vivienda en la cual vende todo tipo de vivieres como: bebidas, arroz, aceites azúcar, etc.
Es soltera, tiene un hijo de 16 años, el la ayuda en la tienda después que retorne de su colegio 
El horario de ella es de lunes a domingo, desde las 8:00am hasta las 20:00pm.
Ella solicita el préstamo para invertir en el negocio y para la compra de mercadería como: bebidas,  arroz, aceites azúcar, etc.
 Su sueño es que su negocio incremente e aumente en las ganancias, ella quisiera abrir un nuevo local en otro sector de la urbe.
texts.en:
Gladys, 61, is a hard-working lady who aspires to growing her business.  She has a grocery store set up in the front part of her house where she sells beverages, rice, oil, sugar, etc.

She is single and has a 16-year-old son who helps her in the store when he gets home from school.  Her opening hours are Monday through Sunday, from 8:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m.  She is requesting a loan to invest in the business by purchasing goods such as softdrinks, rice, oil, sugar, etc.

Her dream is to grow the business and increase earnings.  She would like to open a new store in another area of town.

loans.use: To buy softdrinks, rice, oil, sugar, etc.

loans.name: Maria Lourdes

texts.es: Maria Lourdes tiene 48 años, su actividad  la venta de comida. Inicio hace mas de 13 años, cuando los gastos de sus hijos eran mayores, ya que todos  estaban estudiando entonces decidió buscar una alternativa de empleo propio para ayudar a su esposo a los gastos del hogar. Ella tiene una gran variedad de clientes que llegan a disfrutar de sus platillos pues siempre se esfuerza en proporcionar un buen servicio. El motivo del crédito es para la compra de granos básicos, crema, detergentes, pan, refrescos, jugos, golosinas, bolsas, platos desechables entre otros.
texts.en: Maria Lourdes is 48 years old and her business activity is the sale of foods. She started out more than 13 years ago when her children's expenses increased. They were all in school so she decided to look for an alternative way of working for herself, to help her husband with the household expenses. She has a great variety of clients who come to enjoy her recipes. She always strives to provide a good level of service. The reason for the loan is to purchase basic grains, cream, detergents, bread, soft drinks, juices, sweets, bags, disposable plates, and other products.

loans.use: to purchase basic grains, cream, detergents, bread, soft drinks, juices, sweets, bags, disposable plates, and other products.

loans.name: Julia Patricia

texts.es:
Julia de 36 años, una mujer trabajadora que con la ayuda de sus amigas que la inspiraron a que también se haga parte de esta empresa conocida como Yanbal.
Su negocio es la venta de cosméticos, Trabaja sola vendiendo sus productos a  conocidos y familiares.
Su dificultad es que a veces la gente que ella vende sus productos no le paga en la fecha indicada.
Está separada, tiene 2 hijos, uno de 12 y 15 años, ambos estudian en escuelas públicas.
Ella solicita el préstamo para invertir en su negocio y la compra de mercadería como: perfumes, cremas, desodorantes, etc.
Su deseo es poner un bazar en otro sector de la urbe, mejorar su vivienda y que sus hijos puedan terminar sus estudios.
texts.en:
Julia is 36 years old. She is a very hardworking woman who was inspired by her friends to become part of a company known as Yanbal.

Her business is the sale of cosmetics. She works alone selling her products to her acquaintances and her family.

Her difficulty is that sometimes people to whom she sells her products do not pay on the date indicated.

She is separated and she has 2 children, aged 12 and 15. They both attend public schools. She requests a loan to invest in her business and to purchase merchandise such as: perfumes, skin lotions, deodorants, etc.

Her dream is to set up a general store in another of La Urbe, as well as to improve her house and to see her children complete their studies.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as perfumes, skin lotions, deodorants, etc.

loans.name: Jose Rudy Agapito

texts.es:
José, es un agricultor, cuyo oficio lo aprendió gracias a que sus padres se lo enseñaron, desde entonces él se ha dedicado a la siembra de granos básicos, no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de herbicidas, abono y demás material esta compra le ayudara a que sus cosechas sean exitosas y mejorar los ingresos ara su hogar.
El sueño de Juan, es trabajar para salir adelante con su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
José is a farmer. He learned this profession thanks to his parents, who taught it to him. Since then, he has dedicated himself to planting staple crops. He does not have a set schedule to serve his customers. 

He is requesting a loan to buy herbicides, fertilizer and other supplies, which will help his harvest be successful and improve his income for his household. 

Juan's dream is to work and get ahead with his business and to improve his quality of life.

loans.use: to buy herbicides and fertilizer.

loans.name: Martha Angelica

texts.es: Martha Angelica, madre soltera, de treinta y seis años de edad, reside en una colonia urbana alquilando al Oriente del país y su grupo familiar esta constituido por cuatro hijos uno de los cuales uno es mecánico y ayuda económicamente al sostenimiento de esta familia. Martha posee una venta de jugos y licuados de naranjas sobre una de las calles principales de la ciudad en la que reside, ya cuenta con varios años de dedicarse a esta actividad y ha sido gracias a la cual ha dado alimento y estudio a sus hijos, es una mujer emprendedora y se auto describe como “guerrera”  y que no deja de impulsarse hacia adelante para luchar por el sostenimiento de sus hijos, tiene un carácter muy positivo y ya ha trabajado con créditos. Ella desde muy temprano sale en su vehículo, primero deja a sus hijos que aún estudian en la escuela y luego compra la materia prima para sus deliciosas jugos y se coloca en el negocio que posee a orilla de calle y a ¡vender se ha dicho!. Martha desea comprar al por mayor las naranjas y obtenerlas a precios bajos para mejorar sus ganancias, además desea realizar reparaciones a su vehículo de transporte diario, espera contar con la ayuda de INTEGRAL para que sus actividades continúen siempre adelante y sus hijos tengan una educación digna y no les falte el alimento.-
texts.en: Martha Angelica is a single mother who is thirty-six years old. She rents in an urban colony in the West of the country and her family is composed of her four children. One of them is a mechanic and he contributes financially towards the support of the family. Martha has a business selling juices and orange smoothies along one of the principal streets of the city where she lives. She has been in business for many years and it is thanks to this business that she has been able to feed her children and keep them in school. She is an enterprising woman who describes herself as a "Warrior" who does not stop motivating herself to move forward for the sake of her children. She has a very positive attitude and she has worked with loans in the past. From very early in the day she sets out in her vehicle, first to drop off her children who are still in school and then she goes to purchase the products that she needs to make her delicious juices. She sets up her business the street sidewalk and "Let's start selling!". Martha wants to purchase oranges in wholesale in order to obtain lower prices and improve her profits. She also wants to carry out maintenance repairs to the vehicle she uses every day for transportation. She hopes to count on the support of Integral (Kiva Field Partner) so that her business will continue to move forward and so that her children will have a dignified education and not be left wanting for food.

loans.use: to purchase oranges in wholesales and to carry out maintenance repairs to her vehicle.

loans.name: Miguel Omar

texts.es:
El señor Miguel Omar tiene 45 años de edad y se dedica al negocio de servicio de transporte Taxi, tiene 3 años de haber iniciado con su negocio, su unidad esta asignada a un centro comercial de la ciudad capital, miles de personas visitan este centro comercial y que necesitan los servicios de Miguel.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de repuestos para el motor de su taxi,  actualmente no esta trabajando y necesita su unidad para generar ingresos para cubrir la alimentación y los estudios de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Miguel Omar is 45 years old and his business is the provision of taxi services. He started his business 3 years ago and his unit is assigned to a shopping centre in the capital city. Thousands of people visit the shopping centre and require Miguel's services.

The loan will be used to purchase spare parts for the motor of his taxi. He current is not work and he needs his unit to generate and income and to cover the nutrition and educational expenses of his children.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for the motor of his taxi.

loans.name: Sonia Magdalena

texts.es:
Sonia D. 44 años, una mujer que tiene aspiraciones D. crecimiento en su negocio.
Su negocio es una tienda que está ubicada en L. parte delantera D. su vivienda.
Inicio su negocio con L. ayuda D. su hermano, ahora mantiene este negocio con L. ayuda D. su esposo.
L. dificultad D. elL. es L. delincuencia ya que fue víctima D. un robo a su  negocio.
Tiene dos  hijos uno 15 y 12 años, ambos están en escueL. públicas.
ElL. solicita el préstamo para el tratamiento médico D. su mama ya que elL. esta delicada D. salud.
Su sueño es incrementar su negocio  adecuar su vivienda ya que aun no está terminada.
texts.en:
Sonia is 44 years old and she is a woman who aspires to increase her business.

Her business is a store which is located in the front portion of her house. She started our her business with the help of her brother but she currently maintains the business with the help of her husband.

The difficulty she faces is delinquency and she has been a victim of theft of her business.

She ahs two children, aged 15 and 12, and they both attend public schools.

She requests a loan to for the medical treatment of her mother who is ill.

Her dream is to increase her business and to condition her house as it is still not completely finished.

loans.use: to cover medical expenses and to purchase medicines.

loans.name: Juana

texts.es:
Juana de 25 años, una mujer trabajadora que tiene aspiraciones de crecimiento de negocio.
Su negocio es una tienda, inicio esta actividad hace 2 años.
Esta actividad la realiza sola,  no tiene hijos y no está casada.
La dificultad de ella es que no tiene un vehículo donde ella pueda transportar sus mercaderías.
Ella solicita el préstamo para la compra de un vehículo y con el dinero sobrante para invertir en su negocio.
Su sueño es tener su vehículo y mejorar su vivienda.
texts.en:
Juana is 25 years old.  She is a hard-working woman who aspires to grow her business - a store.  She started her business two years ago and works alone.  She does not have children and is not married. 

Juana's problem is that she doesn't have a vehicle for transporting her merchandise.  She is requesting this loan to buy a vehicle and she will invest any money left over in her business.  Her dream is to own her vehicle and improve her home.

loans.use: to buy rice, oil and sugar

loans.name: William Ernesto

texts.es:
William, vive con su esposa e hijos, es casado administrador y propietario de una tienda de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, maíz, dicho negocio surgió gracias al apoyo de su familia, lo instalo en su casa por lo tanto no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de productos para su negocio: pan, huevos, azucar, pastas, galletas, boquitas, gaseosas, ya que sus clientes a diario demandan estos productos, esta compra le ayudara a crecer y mejorar su negocio.
El sueño de William, es crecer en el negocio y en ingresos para ayudar en los gastos a su familia y darles a sus hijos la educación que merecen.
texts.en:
William is married, and lives with his wife and children. He owns and operates a store that has basic staples, such as rice, beans,and corn. This store came about thanks to the support of his family. He set it up in his home, and therefore he doesn't have fixed hours for serving customers.

He is applying for a loan to buy products for his business, such as bread, eggs, sugar, pasta, cookies, snacks, and soft drinks, as his customers ask for these products on a daily basis. This purchase will help him expand and improve his business.

William's dream is to see his business grow, and his income increase, in order to help with his family's expenses, and give his children the education they deserve.

loans.use: To buy bread, eggs, sugar, pasta, cookies, snacks, and soft drinks for his business.

loans.name: Victor

texts.es: Víctor tiene 47 años, casado con Adriana de 45 años, y fruto de esta relación tienen cuatro hijos. Juntos habitan en el distrito de Sivia, donde tienen su casa propia. Víctor, es una persona que se caracteriza por tener muchos proyectos, una de ellas es la de cultivar plantas de cacao, actividad que lo realiza en compañía de su esposa. A medida que éste negocio se consolidaba, incursionó luegio en producir cacao injertados que se cosechan en menor tiempo y dando un rendimiento óptimo. Pero él planea cultivar otros productos, por ello se levanta muy temprano para preparar la tierras que aún falta por sembrar. Generalmente recibe la ayuda de su familia al momento que necesite extraer sus productos, como el cacao, ya que éste producto tiene mucho mayor demanda a nivel nacional e internacional, en especial el cacao orgánico que Victor sabe cultivar, pues recibe buena paga por cada kilo de aquel fruto. En un futuro próximo él desea implementar su vivero para injertar cacao. Este será su primer crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Con los 1.500 soles, comprará más plantas de cacao para sembrarlas en su parcela.
texts.en:
Víctor is 47 years old and married to 45-year-old Adriana.  The couple have four children and live together in Sivia district, where they have their own house.

Víctor is a man of many projects.  One of these projects is growing cacao plants, an activity that he carries out together with his wife.  As this business was becoming established, he started producing grafted cacao plants which can be harvested in less time and provide an optimal yield.  However, he also plans to grow other crops.  He gets up very early to prepare the land that still has nothing growing in it.  Generally, he has the help of his family when he needs to pick his cacao, for which there is great demand both at home and abroad, particularly for organic cacao which Víctor knows how to grow and for which he receives a good price per kilo.  In the near future, Víctor would like to stock his [plant] nursery for grafting cacao.

This will be Víctor's first loan from MFP and he pledges to make his repayments on time.  He will use his 1,500 soles to buy more cacao plants to sow on his land.

loans.use: to buy cacao plants

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es:
Luis de 19 años, un joven trabajador que tiene aspiraciones de crecimiento de negocio.
Su negocio es una tienda, inicio esta actividad hace 5 años, con su hermano.
Esta actividad la realiza con su hermano,  no tiene hijos y  está casado.
La dificultad de él es la delincuencia ya que fue víctima de un robo en la salida de su negocio.
El solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería como: arroz, legumbres, bebidas, etc.
Su sueño es incrementar su negocio.
texts.en:
Luis is 19 years old.  He is a hard-working young man who aspires to grow his business - a store.  He started his business five years ago with his brother.  He works with his brother.  Luis is married and does not have any children.

Luis' problem is crime as he was robbed outside his business.  He is requesting this loan to buy merchandise such as rice, vegetables, drinks, etc.  His dream is to increase his business.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as rice, vegetables, drinks, etc.

loans.name: Jorge Ivan

texts.es:
Jorge es un hombre luchador, perseverante y dedicado, que pese la falta de oportunidades y desventajas a las que se ha enfrentado en su vida debido a que nació con una distrofia muscular que lo tiene postrado a una silla de ruedas, nunca se ha dado por vencido y mediante la venta de dulces y mecato en los semáforos de la Avenida 80 en la ciudad de Medellín en el departamento de Antioquia, consigue el sustento para él y sus familiares. 

Jorge sueña con tener un puesto fijo de trabajo donde no tenga que desplazarse tanto, ya que por ejemplo en días de lluvia se ve muy afectado para desplazarse en su silla de ruedas, es por esto que actualmente solicita un préstamo para adquirir una nueva caseta donde guardar sus dulces y mecatos, para poder tener mas mercancía, mejorar las ventas, mayores ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida suya y de su familia.
texts.en:
Jorge is a tenacious, persevering and committed man.  In spite of the lack of opportunities and disadvantages that he has faced in his life owing to the fact that he was born with muscular dystrophy which confines him to a wheelchair, he has never given up. Through his business selling sweet treats and candies at the traffic lights on Avenida 80, in the city of Medellín, in Antioquia department, he manages to provide for himself and his family members.

Jorge dreams of having a fixed workplace so that he doesn't have to move around so much because on rainy days, for example, he finds it very hard to move around in his wheelchair.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan to buy a new stand where he can keep his sweet treats and candies.  This will enable him to have more merchandise, improve his sales, improve his income and improve his own life as well as that of his family.

loans.use: to buy a sales stand to work from and to buy more sweet treats and candies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy stones, silver chains, silver hooks and silver decorations

loans.name: Sara Cecilia

texts.es:
Sara, vive con su esposo e hijos, es casada y agricultora, ella colabora con su esposo en la siembra maíz y plátano este negocio lo comenzó por  iniciativa propia y con la ayuda de su esposo, ya hace quince años que se dedica a la agricultura y no tiene un horario establecido para atender las labores que demanda la agricultura.
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos para el cultivo, como abono y herbicidas, Esta compra le ayudara a mejorar su cosecha y prevenirlo de cualquier plaga, con ello su cultivos.
La aspiracion de Sara es tener buenos resultados, que generen ganancias para mejorar su calidad de vida junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Sara is married and lives with her husband and children. She is a farmer, and she and her husband grow corn and plantains.  

She started this business at her own initiative, with her husband's help. She has been farming for 15 years, and doesn't have set hours for serving her customers. She is applying for the loan in order to buy agricultural supplies for her crop, such as fertilizer and herbicides. 

This purchase will help her improve her harvest and protect her crop from any pests. Sara's ambition is to have good results that generate profits; so that she can improve her quality of life and that of her family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides for her crop.

loans.name: Jorge Maximo

texts.es:
Jorge de 41 años, vive en una zona suburbana llamada “Isla Trinitaria”.
Su taller de fabricación de muebles lo empezó haces 5 años, actualmente trabaja con su hijo de 25 años.
No tiene dificultad, es soltero y tienes aspiraciones de mejoramiento de vivienda.
El solicita el préstamo para el mejoramiento de vivienda.
Su sueño es terminar de construir su vivienda en donde pueda tener una vida feliz con su hijo.
texts.en: Jorge is 41 years old. He lives in a suburban area called “Isla Trinitaria”. He started his furniture making workshop 5 years ago and he now works with his 25 year old son. He has no difficulties. He is single and aspires to improve his home. He is asking for the loan for home improvement. His dream is to finish building his home so he can have a happy life with his son.

loans.use: to buy cement, blocks and sand.

loans.name: Luz María

texts.es: Luz María,  de cuarenta y cinco años de edad, reside en zona urbana en uno de los municipios de la capital del país, junto a ella se encuentran viviendo su esposo que es pensionado y dos hijos Sara y Alexis que son estudiantes de noveno y séptimo grado respectivamente. Luz María vende calzado y ropa para todos los gustos y géneros de moda y ocasiones. Ella vende sus productos de forma ambulante por los parques, colonias y principales calles del lugar cerca de donde reside, ya son varios años de dedicarse a esta actividad y ello ha hecho que ya cuente con muchos clientes que la prefieren por lo accesible de sus precios y facilidades de pago, éste negocio ha resultado un principal sosten económico para la familia de Luz y ahora ella desea hacerlo crecer es por ello que se encuentra solicitando la ayuda de INTEGRAL para hacer posible este sueño comprando nueva mercadería que sus clientes le piden como variedad de zapato para caballero y damas, así como nuevos estilos de blusas y camisas, espera con las ganancias poder seguir dando estudio a sus hijos y mejorar su  calidad de vida
texts.en:
Luz María is forty-five years old and she lives in an urban area in one of the municipalities of the country’s capital. She lives with her husband who is a pensioner and her two children Sara and Alexis who are ninth and seventh grade students respectively. 

Luz María sells shoes and clothes to suit all tastes, fashion senses and occasions. She travels around to sell her products in parks, residential areas and the main streets close to where she lives. She has been doing this for several years and she has many customers that favor her business due to the affordability of her prices and the payment facilities she offers. 

This business has turned out to be an important financial support to Luz’s family and she would now like to develop it. Therefore, she is requesting help from INTEGRAL to enable her to buy new merchandise that her customers have been asking for, such as a variety of men’s and women’s shoes as well as new styles of blouses and shirts. She hopes that with her earnings she will be able to continue to support her children’s education and improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy a variety of blouses and men's and women's shoes

loans.name: Damary Apolonia

texts.es:
Damary, es propietaria y administradora de una tienda donde ofrece artículos para toda necesidad como granos básicos, refrescos, galletas, dulces,  y lo ha logrado sacar adelante con su esfuerzo, dicho negocio lo tiene en su casa por ello lo atiende a tiempo completo.
Ella está solicitando un crédito para la compra de granos básicos, arroz, frijoles, azucar, cafe, y más mercadería como boquitas, galletas, dulces, para su negocio ya que esta mercaderia es demandada por sus clientes, esta compra le ayudara a surtir su tienda.
La proyeccion de Damary es incrementar su negocio para mejorar sus ingresos económicos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Damary owns and operates a store where she sells a variety of household items, such as basic staples, soft drinks, cookies, and candy. She has managed to keep it going through her hard work. As she has the business in her home, she runs it full time.

She is applying for a loan to buy basic staples, rice, beans, sugar, coffee, and other merchandise such as snacks, cookies and candy for her business, as her customers are asking for these products. This purchase will help her supply her store. 

Damary's plan is to increase her business, in order to improve her income and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: To buy rice, beans, sugar and coffee.

loans.name: Mujeres De Union Y Paz Group

texts.en:
This group is located in in the rural areas surrounding San Pedro de Macoris. They all live in a big rural community, surrounded by sugarcane fields.

Rosa is the coordinator of the group, Mujeres de Union y Paz 1, 2 & 3 (Women of Union and Peace). She is mother of two children and they live together in a modest home. She is a single mother. 

She has had her used clothing business for around eight years, starting with some capital she saved. She plans to use this loan to invest in her business, and she will buy two packages of these clothes. Before she started selling used clothes, she sold underwear.

She says that her most important challenge is when her clients don't pay her, because she used to sell on credit to be paid every 15 days. For now, she plans to continue to enjoy working.

Rosa is excited to be taking her ninth loan with Esperanza after having successfully repaid her previous loan and grown her business. She is planning to uses her business profits to build her house and business. She dreams of finishing her house.

loans.use: to buy bags of used clothes to resell.

loans.name: Warmin Antawipa Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “WARMIN ANTAWIPA” iniciará su tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por once integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva encabezada por la señora Mónica. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos tenemos: comercial y agencia de empleos, salón de belleza, venta de DVD’s y CD’s, venta de frutas, venta de pasteles, comerciante de dulces, bazar, venta de cosméticos, venta de pinturas, librería. 

La señora Mónica indica que hace siete meses que integra Pro Mujer  por invitación de sus las socias antiguas. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio organización de fiestas que  viene trabajando hace siete años.

El crédito que ahora sacará es para el crecimiento de su negocio, ya que incorporará la pastelería, es por ello que comprará un horno, que adquirirá de la Ceja y lo comercializa en su tienda. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar en lo posible a su familia, pues ella es casada y un hijo.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta las reuniones.

En la fotografía no aparese el señor Gary por razones culturales
texts.en:
The “WARMIN ANTAWIPA” communal bank will begin its third cycle in Pro Mujer, as a part of the Centro Villa Exaltación. It is made up of eleven members and led by a board of directors headed by Mónica. The businesses that the association members have are various. Among them, we have:  a store and an employment agency, a beauty shop, DVD and CD sales, selling fruit, selling pastries, selling candies, a variety store, selling cosmetics, selling paints, and a book store. 

Mónica indicates that she has been a member of Pro Mujer for seven months, on the invitation of older members. At present, she has had a business organizing parties for seven years.

The loan she will now take out is to grow her business, since she is going to include pastry-making. She will buy an oven, which she will acquire from La Ceja and she will sell from her store. This type of work will allow her to generate income to support her family as much as possible. She is married and has a son.   

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the meetings. 

In the photograph, Gary does not appear due to cultural reasons.

loans.use: to buy an oven.

loans.name: Jose Darwin

texts.es:
José,esta soltero, es agricultor, el negocio lo inicio con su padre de quien recibe ayuda en el trabajo, todos los dias  de lunes a sábado trabaja a tiempo completo.
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de insumos agrícolas, como semilla mejorada y abono, entre otras cosas, esta compra le ayudara a mejorar sus cosechas y mejorar los ingresos.
La aspiracion de José es trabajar, mantenerse en el negocio para recibir mayores ingresos para mantenerse y colaborar con su familia.
texts.en:
José is single, and a farmer. He started this business with his father, who helps him with the work. He works full time, every day from Monday to Saturday. 

He is applying for a loan in order to buy agricultural supplies, such as hybrid seed, fertilizer, and other things. This purchase will help him improve his harvests and income.

José's ambition is to work, and stay in the business, in order to earn more income to support himself, and contribute to his family's expenses.

loans.use: To buy hybrid seed and fertilizer for his crop.

loans.name: Eclipse Group

texts.es:
Este Banco comunal se llama “Eclipse” lo conforman 21 emprendedores, quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros entre los cuales se encuentran atención de un almacén, bazar, paquetería, verdulería, artesanía en piedras preciosas, oro y plata, orfebrería, artesanía en madera y venta de ropa usada. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la comuna de Colina, ciudad de Santiago. 
Angelica integrante del Banco comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra sentada en primera fila, ocupando el primer lugar de derecha a izquierda y en sus piernas carga a su pequeño hijo de 3 años de edad.
Ella se dedica a la artesanía en madera y vende principalmente artículos para el hogar. Trabaja en éste oficio desde hace 15 años. Sus productos los vende en ferias libres.
Su mercadería la compra en distribuidoras ubicadas en la comuna de Estación Central, ciudad de Santiago. 
Con el crédito comprará materiales y mercadería para su negocio.
Las metas en su negocio son formalizarlo y tener una microempresa familiar, ya que su marido también se dedica a la artesanía en madera, pero realiza juguetes. Para concretar éste proyecto deben contar con un capital más alto.
Angelica vive junto a su marido y sus tres hijos de 20, 12 y 3 años de edad. Sus sueños a nivel personal son generar una estabilidad laboral y económica que le permita brindarle a su familia un mayor bienestar de vida.  
Angelica está muy contenta y agradecida del crédito y servicios entregados por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le han dado la oportunidad de invertir en sus negocios a mucha gente emprendedora. 
Comenta que el grupo está muy afiatado y entusiasmado con la prosperidad de cada uno de sus negocios.
Colina es una comuna de la región metropolitana (donde está Santiago, capital de Chile) ubicada al norte de la misma. Actualmente es centro de importantes inversiones, principalmente en el área agro industrial, debido a la instalación de grandes e importantes empresas, que de paso entregan un gran número de empleos a la comunidad. Es también un área de parcelaciones de agrado, lo que ha contribuido a aumentar considerablemente el número de habitantes. También cuenta con espacios adecuados al turismo, tales como termas, deporte en la Laguna Piedra Roja y montañismo.
texts.en:
The communal bank called Eclipse is made up of 21 entrepreneurs who work in different fields among which are care of a store, bazaar, parcel service, vegetable merchant, artisan in precious stones, gold and silver, craftsman in precious metals, craftsman in wood, and used clothing. All the members live in the area of Colina in the city of Santiago.

One member of the communal bank is named Angelica, who in the photo is sitting at the end of the front row, with her little 3 year old son in her lap. She is a craftsman with wood and sells mostly items for the house. She has been doing this work for 15 years. Her products are sold in the open markets. She buys her merchandise from distributors located in the area of Estación Central in Santiago. With the money from the loan she plans to buy merchandise and supplies for her business.

She has clear business goals of having a small family business. Her husband is also an artist working in wood, mainly making toys. In order to achieve her goal she needs more working capital.

Angelica works together with her husband and her three children of 20, 12, and 3 years old. Her particular dreams are to have stable work and earnings in order to give her family a better quality of life.

Angelica is very happy and grateful for the loans and services provided by Fondo Esperanza for giving many enterprising people the chance to invest in their businesses. She says that this group is very supporting and enthusiastic with successful businesses.

Colina is a town in the metropolitan area located north of Santiago, capital of Chile. Right now it is the center of major investments, mostly in the agro-industrial area, due to the installation of large and significant companies, who provide a large number of jobs to the community. It is also an area of popular subdivisions, which has contributed to a marked increase of residents. Also, there are many tourism spots such as spas, sports on the Laguna Piedra Roja, and mountain climbing.

loans.use: to buy supplies and merchandise for her business

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: la señora Lourdes es cliente antigua de la institución desde el año 2001, ella tiene un atienda de barrio donde se dedica a la venta de diversos artículos como pan, refrescos, abarrotes, enlatados, etc., su  tienda es muy surtida, se encuentra todo tipo de artículos, desde una aguja por así decirlo,  el lugar donde se encuentra la tienda es también estratégico y ella abastece a los vecinos de la zona,  ya que es la única tienda por el barrio,  la señora Lourdes vive en la misma zona y lugar donde es su negocio,  ella vive con su hija,  yerno y nietos, es una persona muy dinámica y trabajadora, con su negocio y los créditos anteriores ha logrado hacer crecer su capital y el negocio que tiene, por lo que se solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como refrescos y dulces para surtir su tienda, se encuentra agradecida con la institución por el apoyo.
texts.en:
Lourdes is an old client, since 2001, of the communal bank. She has a neighborhood store and sells diverse items such as bread, drinks, groceries, canned goods, and other items. Her store is well supplied and one can find all sorts of things, even a needle so to speak. Her store is found in a strategic location, and she meets the demand of the neighborhood residents. It is the only store in the area.

Lourdes lives in the neighborhood where her store is located. She lives with her daughter, son-in-law, and nieces and nephews. She is very energetic and enterprising.

Through her business and previous loans she has increased her capital and her business has grown. She is asking for a loan in order to buy merchandise such as drinks and sweets in order to supply her store. She is very grateful for the help of the communal bank.

loans.use: to buy merchandise, refreshments, and soft drinks

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repaint her vehicle and to buy accessories

loans.name: Maria De Los Angeles

texts.es:
María, vive con su hijos, es casada, tiene una venta de comida en el mercado, dicho negocio lo inicio por iniciativa propia, desde hace 2 años trabaja de lunes a sábado de 7:00 a.m. a 3:00 p.m. 
Ella está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de verduras, carnes, pollos y demás necesidades de su negocio ya que es para atender la demanda de la clientela, esta compra le ayudara a mejorar su negocio.
El Objetivo de María es mantenerse trabajando para mejorar sus ingresos económicos y darles el estudio adecuado a sus hijos.
texts.en:
María is married and lives with her children. She sells food in the market. She started this business two years ago through her own initiative. She works from Monday to Saturday from 7:00am to 3:00pm.  

She is applying for a loan in order to buy vegetables, meats, chickens, and the other things she needs for her business, in order to meet the demand from her clientele. This purchase will help her improve her business.

María's objective is to keep working to improve her income, and provide her children with a proper education.

loans.use: To buy vegetables, meats, chicken, and other products for her business.

loans.name: Gloria Angelica

texts.es: Gloria Angélica, D. cincuenta y siete años D. edad, resiD. en colonia urbana cerca a la zona D. cordilleras del país desD. hace mas D. 35 años, junto a ella su esposo Don José que es empleado y genera ingreso para el sostenimiento del hogar. Gloria a fin D. contribuir al sostenimiento del hogar y mejorar su calidad D. vida decidió desD. hace más D. cuatro años vender medicina natural y popular D. forma ambulante en colonias cercanas a donD. vive, ella cuenta con descuentos preferenciales en droguerías que permite adquirirlas a bajos precios y que las proponga a precios accesibles a sus clientes, por eso la prefieren y ella obtiene un ingreso con el cual pueD. llevar alimento a su hogar. Gloria es una mujer optimista y desea en esta ocasión reinvertir a su negocio comprando medicamento con el que no ha podido contar y sus clientes se encuentran demandando, como son pomadas para dolores musculares, desparasitantes, cremas cicatrizantes, tratamientos para infecciones urinarias y bronquiales. Cuenta que con el apoyo que INTEGRAL esto se transforme D. un sueño a una realidad y su anhelado sueño granD. D. mejorar la calidad D. vida D. su familia gracias a estos pequeños impulsos se acerquen cada vez mas a el.-
texts.en:
Gloria Angélica is 57 years old and lives in an urban area near the mountainous area of the country. She lives with her husband Don José who is employed and earns money for household expenses.

Gloria, in order to contribute to the household and to improve their quality of life, decided more than 4 years ago to sell natural and popular medicine in the neighborhood towns close to where she lives. She is offered a discount in drugstores, and buys at low prices which allows her to sell at affordable prices to her customers which they appreciate and she makes a profit with which she can buy food for the home.

Gloria is an optimistic woman and wants on this occasion to reinvest in her business buying healing remedies which she has not been able to as her clients ask for them, such as ointments for muscle pain, deworming medication, healing creams, and treatments for urinary tract infections and bronchitis.

She says that with the support of INTEGRAL, and thanks to these little whims that come increasingly to her, her yearned for big dream of improving the quality of life for her family changes from a dream to fact.

loans.use: to buy ointments for muscle pain, deworming medication, healing creams, and treatments for urinary tract infections and bronchitis

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy snacks, sweets, cookies, soft drinks, cooking oil and pasta.

loans.name: Paulino

texts.es: El Sr. Paulino es casado tiene 48 años de edad,  vive con su esposa y dos hijos en una casa de interés social que adquirió desde hace doce años y que aun le siguen descontando vía nomina. Cuando Paulino inicio a pagar su casa siempre lo hizo pensando en que era el patrimonio de su esposa e hijos, que si el algún día llegara a faltar no se quedaría desamparados; desde ese entonces el le ha ido haciendo mejoras a su vivienda como los colocación de vitropiso, protecciones en las ventanas, pintura al interior y exterior de su vivenda, levantar barda y algunas otras mejoras que son visibles. El Sr. Paulino solicita el apoyo para compra de herrería y colocar un portón metálico al frente de su domicilio; este portón le dará una bonita fachada a su casa pero lo mas importante ofrecerá seguridad a su familia cuando el no se encuentre en casa.
texts.en: Sr. Paulino is married and is 48 years old. He lives with his wife and two children in a social interest house that he acquired two years ago and that he still pays for at a discounted rate. When Paulino began to pay for his house he always did so thinking that it was also the property of his wife and children, and that if one day something were to happen to him they would not be left homeless. Since then, he has made continual improvements to his home such as putting up flooring, window protection, painting the interior and exterior, putting up fences, and other visible improvements. Sr. Paulino is asking for help to purchase ironworks and put a metal door on the front of his home. It will give a nice outward appearance to the home but the most important is that it will offer security to his family when he is not at home.

loans.use: to put a metal door on his hosue

loans.name: Rancho Luna Group

texts.es:
el grupo Rancho Luna esta integrado por 4 personas, 1 hombre y 3 mujeres, dicho grupo esta ubicado en la comunidad de El Pozo Bendito, El Paraiso, todos tienen varios años de conocerse y han tomado la decision de formar este grupo para salir adelante con sus negocios y con sus familias, el coordinador del grupo es el sr. Carlos Orlando, quien tiene 28 años de edad,vive en unión libre y se dedica a prestar los servicios de cortar pelo, tiene una barberia la cual la inicio hace 3 años y tiene clientes permanentes, muchos lo prefieren ya que corta bien el pelo y los precios son adecuados para sus clientes.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de una maquina para cortar pelo, una secadora de pelo, una navaja, una vitrina, espejo, hojas de afeitar, cremas, gel para pelo, asi ofrecer un servicio mas completo a sus clientes y obtener la satisfacción de los mismos. los otros integrantes del grupo son Magdalena quien se dedica a la elaboracion de pan, rosquillas y galletas.  Doña Ada quien se dedica a la elaboracion de rosquillas y doña Lidia quien se dedica tambien a la elaboracion de rosquillas.
juntos trabajan duro para salir adelante con sus familias.
texts.en:
The Rancho Luna Group consists of 4 people, 1 man and 3 women. This group is located in El Pozo Bendito, El Paraiso. They have all known each other for several years and have decided to form this group in order to get ahead with their businesses and with their families. The group coordinator is Sr. Carlos Orlando who is 28 years old and is in a common-law marriage. He is a barber. He has a barber's shop which he set up 3 years ago and he has regular customers. Many prefer to use his service as he cuts hair well and at a reasonable price for his customers. He will use the loan to buy a haircutting machine, a hair dryer, a razor, a display cabinet, a mirror, razor blades, lotions and hair gel. In this way he can provide his customers with a more complete service and satisfy their needs. The other members of the group are Magdalena who makes bread, donuts and cookies; Doña Ada who makes donuts and Doña Lidia who also makes donuts.

Together they work hard to get ahead with their families.

loans.use: to buy hair cutting tools.

loans.name: Nancy Prudencia

texts.es: La Sra. Nancy es cliente antigua de la institución, en el crédito anterior también era cliente Kiva, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas de temporada, en esta época se encuentra vendiendo locoto, limones y limas, pero ya llega la cosecha de mangos, fruta que trae de sus propiedades de los yungas, por lo que solicita este crédito para realizar esa actividad y traslado de esa mercadería.  Su esposo tiene un  taxi que lo trabaja especialmente por la zona central, ambos con su esfuerzo y con los préstamos de la institución lograron construir su casa donde viven con sus dos hijos en edad escolar, y otros dos hijos mayores quienes formaron su propio hogar, la Sra., Nancy es una cliente responsable quien trabaja con nosotros desde hace diez años, son clientes muy responsables, en la foto se encuentra en compañis de su esposo.
texts.en: Sra. Nancy is a long-term member of the microfinance institution. With her previous loan she was also a member of Kiva. She sells seasonal fruit. At this time of the year, she sells locoto (peppers), lemons and limes. However, the mango harvest will be here soon, a fruit that displays properties of Los Yungas, which is why she is asking for a loan for the purchase and transfer of the goods. Her husband has a taxi with which he serves the central district in particular. Both of them with their hard work and the loans from the institution managed to build their own house where they live with their 2 children of school age. Two other children, who are adults, have their own homes. Sra. Nancy is a responsible member who has been working with us for 10 years. They are responsible members. In the photo she is in the company of her husband.

loans.use: to pay for the transport of fruit from Los Yungas to the city of La Paz.

loans.name: Desiderio

texts.es:
Desiderio, en su primer préstamo hizo varios proyectos en la hortalizas, logro pagar el préstamo y le quedo un margen de ganancia, esto le motivo a continuar trabajando con este apoyo, el cual le permite mejorar sus cultivos y tener beneficios para su familia.
El presente préstamo será utilizado en la compra de semillas de tomates, chiles y ejotes, además de comprar poliducto, mariposas, abono  y pago de mano de obra, también la compra de maya para mosquitos, todos estos materiales son necesarios para iniciar la nueva siembra, y a través del préstamo lograra tener todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
In his first loan, Desiderio carried out various farming projects. He succeeded in paying back the loan and earned a margin of profit. This motivated him to continue working with this support, which helps him improve his crop and have benefits for his family. 

The current loan will be used to purchase seeds for tomatoes, chilies, and green beans. He will also purchase polyduct plastic tubing, butterflies, fertilizer, and wages for hired help. All of these materials are necessary to begin sowing. With the loan, he will be able to have everything he needs.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, polyduct plastic tubing, butterflies, fertilizer, and to pay for hired help.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es: La señora Irene tiene 64 años vive en una casa de interés social desde hace 15 años ella sola, es pensionada desde hace 3 años y su pensión es su única fuente de ingresos para solventar su necesidades básicas de alimentación, calzado y vestido, pago de servicios. La señora Irene cuenta con servicio medico, pero ella requiere hacerse unos estudios mas especializados que ya tiene programados pero para dentro de 2 meses, ella sabe que por su edad esta expuesta a contraer enfermedades causadas por la edad con mucha facilidad es por ello que la Sra. Irene requiere saber cuanto antes el resultado de esos estudios ya que no se quiere ver enferma a futuro con una enfermedad que si se detectaría a tiempo no le trajera consecuencias y es por ello que solicita el apoyo para realizarse esos estudios médicos
texts.en: Señora Irene is 64 years old and has lived in a social welfare house for the last 15 years. She has been pensioned for 3 years and her pension is her only source of income with which to pay for her basic necessities of food, footwear and clothing, utility payments. Señora Irene is covered for medical services, but requires more specialized tests to be performed. She already has tan appointment for hese tests but not for 2 more months. She knows that due to her age she is much more susceptible to age-related diseases which is why Sra. Irene needs to know as soon as possible the results of these tests as she doesn't want to fall ill in the future with an illness that if detected in time could be avoided. This is why she is asking for help to have the medical tests done.

loans.use: to have a medical checkup.

loans.name: Maria Yolanda

texts.es:
María, necesita comprar mercadería para el negocio como cremas, lociones, maquillajes, tintes, por esto se decidió nuevamente a solicitar préstamo, para surtir el negocio y fortalecerlo.
El préstamo anterior le ayudo para comprar mercadería, esto mejoro las ventas y la clientela, ya que tenía un negocio bien establecido, logrando mejorar sus ingresos y las condiciones familiares.
texts.en:
María needs to buy goods for her business such as creams, lotions, make-up, and hair color, so she decided to request a new loan to stock her business and strengthen it.

The previous loan was used to buy merchandise which improved sales and increased the customer base.  She already had a well-established business but this improved her income and family situation.

loans.use: To buy creams, lotions, make-up, and hair color for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy cocoa plants.

loans.name: Rosa Del Carmen

texts.es:
Rosa, desea continuar trabajando con préstamos, porque estos le permiten invertir en el negocio y dar resultados, pagando las cuotas y quedando siempre un margen de ganancia.
Actualmente comprara shampoo, cremas, lociones, pinta uñas, para el negocio, esperando que este nuevo préstamo le de buenos resultados como el anterior. Su condición familiar ha mejorado aunque los integrantes siguen siendo los mismos, siente que cuentan con una mejor solvencia.
texts.en:
Rosa wants to continue working with loans because it allows her to invest in her business and pay back the loans while always maintaining a profit margin.

For now she will buy shampoo, creams, lotions, and nail polish for the business.  She hopes this new loan will be as successful as the previous one.  Her family situation has improved even though the number of members has not changed.  But she feels her ability to cover expenses has improved.

loans.use: To buy shampoo, creams, lotions, and nail polish for her business.

loans.name: Veronica Alexandra

texts.es:
Verónica de 29 años, vive en una zona suburbana llamada “Durán”.
El negocio de ella es la venta de cosméticos como: perfumes, desodorantes, etc.
Ella inicio esta actividad hace 5 años.
El horario de ella es de 8:00am hasta 4:00pm.
La dificultad de ella es la delincuencia.
Tiene 3 hijos uno 12, 15, 17 años de edad, estudian en escuela públicas. 
Ella solicita el préstamo para invertir en el negocio y para la compra de mercadería como: cremas, perfumes, desodorantes, etc.
El sueño de ella es incrementar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Verónica is 29 years old and lives in a suburb called “Durán”. She sells cosmetics such as: perfumes, deoderants, etc. She started this business 5 years ago. She works from 8:00am until 4:00pm. The difficulty she is having is one of crime.

She has 3 children: 12, 15 and 17 years of age. They attend government schools.

She is asking for the loan to invest in her business and buy merchandise such as: creams, perfumes, deoderants, etc.

Her dream is to increase sales.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as: creams, perfumes, deoderants, etc.

loans.name: Anibal

texts.es:
el sr. Aníbal tiene 39 años de edad, vive en unión libre, es padre de tres hijos y se dedica a la venta de papas, este producto lo distribuye en las comunidades cercanas a su casa de habitacion, utiliza su pickup para transportar su producto. Anibal desea expander sus ventas pero para eso necesita mas papas, tiene pensado visitar otras comunidades en donde pueda vender mucho mas, por tal razon necesita el credito para la compra de mas papas y asi poder llegar a otros lugares.
la meta de Anibal es que sus hijos sean buenos profesionales.
texts.en:
Sr. Aníbal is 39 years old. He lives in a common-law marriage and is the father of 3 children. He works selling potatoes which he does in the communities near where he lives. He uses his pickup truck to transport his produce. Anibal wants to expand his sales but for that to happen he needs more potatoes. He plans on visiting other communities where he can sell much more. For this reason he needs the loan to buy more potatoes and thus travel to other areas.

Anibal's goal is that his children be good professionals.

loans.use: to buy potatoes.

loans.name: Luis Alonso

texts.es:
Luis, se decidió por otro préstamo ya que la rapidez en la que se le tramita le parece bien, porque en ocasiones las necesidades son urgentes y en esta parte se siente satisfecho con la institución.
Actualmente Luis necesita comprar herbicidas para quitar la maleza del Cañal y pagar mano de obra para realizar la labor. Los préstamos que ha manejado don Luis le han servido para sacar lo pendiente en las actividades como agricultor y brindar a la familia mayores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Luis has decided to request another loan because he likes the fact that it can be processed quickly.  Sometimes the need for a loan can be urgent and this is why he is satisfied with the institution.

Luis needs to buy herbicides to treat the weeds in his cane plantation, and also pay workers to do the work.  The loans Luis has had previously have allowed him to take care of pending issues, from a farmer's standpoint, and give his family more economic income.

loans.use: To buy herbicides and pay hired workers.

loans.name: María Doralba

texts.es:
Al separarse de su esposo y quedando como madre cabeza de hogar, María Doralba se vio en la necesidad de crear su propio negocio con el fin obtener los recursos necesarios para su sustento y el de su familia. Aprovechando los conocimientos que por hobbie había adquirido en las técnicas de belleza, inició con su peluquería que según esta emprendedora ha sido su tabla de salvación.

María Doralba, sueña con tener su propio local y lograr expandirse, conservando la calidad y mejorando constantemente el excelente servicio que presta a su clientela. Es por eso que con la ilusión de seguir progresando quiere comprar más productos de belleza y accesorios necesarios para brindar más calidad y servicio, por lo que solicita un préstamo que le permita cumplir sus metas y sueños, mejorar las ventas y proporcionalmente mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
After separating from her husband, María Doralba became the head of her household and found it necessary to create her own business in order to obtain the necessary income to sustain herself and her family. Taking advantage of the knowledge of beauty techniques she had gained from a hobby, she started the hairstyling business which she says has been her lifesaver. 

María Doralba dreams of having her own premises and expanding, while maintaining the quality of the excellent service she gives her customers and constantly improving it. This is why, in the hopes of further progress, she wants to buy more beauty products and accessories necessary to provide more quality and service. The reason she is asking for a loan is to achieve her goals and dreams, improve her sales and proportionally improve their quality of life.

loans.use: to buy new products and accessories to sell.

loans.name: Marlon Antonio

texts.es: Marlon Antonio tiene su negocio que es la compra y venta de plátano. Desde hace mas de 4 años que tiene este medio de vida, surgió como una alternativa de trabajo para sobrevivir últimamente se ha incrementado las ventas de pues cuenta con su clientela, lo que le ha favorecido para poder incrementar sus ingresos y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia. Marlon ha solicitado un préstamo para la compra de platano, pues recientemente le han ofrecido un buen precio de este producto.
texts.en: Marlon Antonio buys and sells bananas. He has been doing this work for more than 4 years which came about as an alternative form of work in order to survive. Recently sales have increased as he has regular customers he can count  on to help improve his earnings and his family's quality of life. Marlon has asked for a loan to buy bananas as recently he has been offered a good price for this product.

loans.use: to buy bananas.

loans.name: Teresa Petrona

texts.es: La señora Teresa Se dedica a la venta D. verdura es cliente antigua D. la institución ella vive en la zona D. Coqueni en su casita propia sus hijos ya son mayores pero ella esta ampliando la casita para dejarles a ellos algo para el futuro D. sus nietos, por tal motivo solicito el crédito para la compra D. material D. construcción para la construcción y ampliación D. su casita, la Sra. Teresa es una mujer muy dedicada a su familia vive en compañía D. su esposo que trabaja como chofer asalariado en un micro, ambos luchan por salir adelante y se sienten agradecidos con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en: Señora Teresa sells vegetables and is a long-term member of the microfinance institution. She lives in the Coqueni area in her own small house. Her children are all grown-up but she is enlarging her small house so as to leave her grandchildren something for the future. For this reason she is asking for a loan to buy building materials to enlarge her house. Sra. Teresa is devoted to her family and lives with her husband who works as a wage-earning bus driver. They both work hard to get ahead and are grateful to the institution for its support.

loans.use: to buy building materials with which to enlarge her house.

loans.name: Luis Antonio

texts.es:
Luis, vive con su esposa y un hijo, es vendedor de frazada, set de cubrecamas y cortinas entre otras cosas para el hogar, este negocio se dio gracias a su propia iniciativa, no tiene horario fijo para atender a sus clientes, y cuenta con experiencia. 
El está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de mercaderia de trabajo: frazadas, cortinas, cubrecamas, colchas, sabanas, esta compra le ayudara a surtir su negocio ya que es necesario para ofrecerle más mercadería  a sus clientes y le ayudara a mejorar sus ganancias.
La proyeccion de Luis es mantener el negocio y generar más ingresos para el hogar y la educación de su hijo.
texts.en:
Luis lives with his wife and son.  He sells blankets, bedspread sets, curtains and other household textiles.  The business was started on his own initiative and he has experience.  He has no fixed work schedule to attend to customers.

He is requesting a loan to buy merchandise for his business such as blankets, curtains, bedspreads and sheets.  This will help him increase inventory because he must be able to offer more variety to his customers to improve his profits.

Luis plans to stay in business and generate more income for his household and son's education.

loans.use: To buy blankets, curtains, bedspreads, and sheets for his business.

loans.name: Gladis Del Transito

texts.es:
Gladis, vive con su esposo, y sus dos hijos, es propietaria D. una venta D. mariscos al igual se dedica a la agricultura, tales negocios se dieron gracias a su iniciativa y la ayuda D. su familia, trabaja D. 7:00 a.m a 5:00 p.m.
Actualmente está solicitando un préstamo  para la compra D. insumos agricolas: abono y herbicidas para sus cultivos y productos para la venta D. mariscos, esta inversion le ayudara a mejorar sus negocios para un mejor servicio a su clientela.
El sueño D. Gladis es seguir cultivando granos basicos y vendiendo mariscos para mejorar los ingresos en su hogar y darles el estudio adecuado a sus dos hijos.
texts.en:
Gladis lives with her husband and two children.  She sells seafood and also is involved in agriculture.  With the help of her family, she set up both businesses on her own initiative.  Her work hours are from 7:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.

She currently is requesting a loan to buy farm supplies such as fertilizer and herbicides for her crops as well as products for seafood sales.  This investment will help improve the businesses as customer service will be better.

Gladis' goal is to continue growing basic grains and selling seafood to improve the household income and give her children a good education.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and herbicides for her crop.

loans.name: Ever Orlando

texts.es:
el sr. Ever tiene 26 años de edad, esta soltero y se dedica a la venta de relojes, tiene una experiencia de 6 años en la venta de relojes, su negocio está ubicado en un punto estratégico, se encuentra cerca de la terminal de buses, por este lugar transitan muchas personas de diferentes aldeas y caserios, mismas que le compran los relojes a Ever.
el credito lo utilizara para la compra de relojes para dama y caballero, brazaletes de repuesto y pines.
así tendra variedad que ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Ever is 26 years old, single, and his business is selling watches.  He has 6 years experience selling watches.  His business is located in a strategic location, near the bus station.  Many people from different villages and hamlets pass through this place and buy watches from Ever.  

Ever will use his loan to buy men's and ladies' watches, replacement straps and pins.  This means he will have a variety to offer his customers.

loans.use: to buy watches, replacement straps and pins

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy packages of used clothes to resell.

loans.name: Elvia Belgica

texts.es:
Elvia, vive en una zona suburbana llamada “Duran”,
Una mujer muy humilde y con aspiraciones de crecimiento de negocio.
Su negocio es una tienda, que está ubicada en la parte delantera de su vivienda.

Esta actividad la realiza con sus hijos, su horario es de lunes a domingo, desde las 7:00am hasta las 23:00pm.
Tiene dos hijos, ya son mayores de edad.
Su dificultad es la competencia y la delincuencia.
El solicita el préstamo para la compra de mercadería como: arroz, aceites, bebidas, atún, etc. 
Su sueño es incrementar más sus ventas.
texts.en:
Elvia lives in a suburb called “Duran”. She is a very poor woman with aspirations of growing her business. She has a store for a business which is located in the front part of her house. 

She runs the store with her children. Her schedule is from 7:00am to 23:00pm, Mondays to Sundays. She has 2 children, both adults. Her problem is the competition and crime in the area.

She is asking for a loan to buy merchandise such as: rice, oil, beverages, tuna, etc.

Her dream is to further increase sales.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as: rice, oil, beverages, tuna, etc.

loans.name: Beber

texts.es: Beber, de 38 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador y muy amable, convive con Juliana, y juntos tiene un hijo de dos años de edad. Juntos habitan en su casa propia. La actividad que realiza Beber es la venta de pan, alimento que previamente los compra en la panadería y los lleva a vender de forma ambulante por diversas zonas de su barrio, así como en zonas aledañas. Paralelo a esto también brinda préstamo de dinero con intereses del 20% a 20 días, puede ser a vecinos, familiares y personas de confianza. Ambos negocios lo realiza desde hace 6 meses, y lo que le gusta es poder contar con un ingreso económico con el cual pueda pagar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, por ello considera rentable porque le ha ido bien en ambas actividades logrando tener ganancias, y sin tener muchos contratiempos con el pago de sus deudas. Tiene planes de crecer su capital de trabajo y abrir  un local denominado casas de empeño. Este sería el crédito número cinco con MFP, se siente bien con su grupo comunal, ya que son personas responsables. Por otro lado desea seguir contando con el apoyo de ustedes. Con el monto solicitado, lo invertirá en préstamos, así también en la compra de pan.
texts.en: Beber is38 years old and a hardwroking and friendly man. He lives in a common-law marriage with his partner Juliana and together they have a 2 year old child. They live in their own house. Beber sells bread, which he buys previously from a bakery and then sells on the street in various areas of his neighbourhood as well as in areas close by. He also has a business loaning money at 20% for 20 days to neighbours, relatives and trust-worthy people. He has been running both businesses for 6 months and what he likes is to be able to count on an income with which to pay his household expenses. For this reason he thinks the businesses profitable as he is doing well and making profit without too many problems with the payment of his debts. He has plans to grow his working capital and open a denominated pawn house. This is his 5th loan with MFP and he feels good about his communal bank group as they are responsible people. On the other hand he wants to be able to continue counting with your support. With the amount requested, he will invest it in loans and also to buy bread.

loans.use: to buy bread.

loans.name: Wilbert Alberto

texts.es:
Wilber,vive con su esposa y su hija, es agricultor siembra maiz y frijol, dicho negocio surgió por su propio esfuerzo y la ayuda de su esposa, llevan 6 años de trabajar la tierra, de las cosechas logran mantener la alimentación del hogar. 
El, está solicitando un crédito para la compra de abono y herbicidas para las plagas, esta compra le ayudara a mejorar sus cosechas para tener un mayor porcentaje produccion de la cual pueda vender para generar ganancias para el hogar..
El quiere ir mejorando su trabajo para crecer en los cultivos y que sean muy provechosos y salir adelante con su familia.
texts.en:
Wilber lives with his wife and daughter.  He is a farmer who grows corn and beans.  This business came about through his own efforts and he works with the help of his wife.  They have been working the land for six years and, through their harvests, they manage to provide food for their household.  

Wilber is requesting a loan to buy fertilizer and herbicides to fight pests.  This purchase will help him to improve his harvests so that he will have a larger percentage of his production that he can sell in order to make profits for his household.

Wilber would like to improve in his work.  He would like to grow his crops better and for them to be very profitable.  He would like to get ahead in life with his family.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides for his crops

loans.name: Desideria

texts.es: la señora Desideria es cliente nueva D. la institución vino a la agencia por recomendación D. la Señora Andrea cliente antigua D. la institución quien es amiga D. la Sra. Desideria, la Sra. Desideria vive en la zona D. Ovejuyo en su casita la cual construyeron con gran esfuerzo con su esposo el cual es albañil y por  realizar la construcción D. la vivienda tuvo que viajar a trabajar a Santa Cruz D. donD. manda dinero  para ayudarle a su esposa y sus hijos la señora se dedica a la venta D. cordero y queso los cuales compra D. los pueblos vecinos y los venD. en distintas zonas D. la ciudad,  también  ella recolecta baterías D. autos para venderlos,  ella es una mujer muy trabajadora  por lo que esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra D. mercadería  cordero y queso y poder expandir sus ventas ya que estos dos productos tienen gran demanda, la Sra. Desideria esta agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado
texts.en:
Desideria is a new client of the institution.  She came to the agency on the recommendation of Andrea, a former client who is a friend of Desideria.

Desideria lives in the Ovejuyo area in her little house, which they built with great effort, she and her husband, a builder.  To be able to build the house, he had to travel for work to Santa Cruz, from where he sends money to help his wife and children.

Desideria works selling lamb and cheese, which she buys in neighboring towns and sells in various areas of the city.  She also collects car batteries to sell.  She is a hardworking woman, which is why she is requesting the loan to buy merchandise--lamb and cheese--to be able to increase her sales, as these two products are in demand.

Desideria is grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: to buy lamb and cheese.

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es:
Jorge, con el préstamo anterior ha podido construir una parte de su vivienda. El es un hombre muy honrado.

Es solicita un préstamo para poder acabar su vivienda, ya que se acerca la navidad y la esposa le dijo que hiciera todo lo posible para que puedan pasar bien esa fecha tan inolvidable.Su sueño es que su casa esté terminada.
texts.en:
With his previous loan Jorge has been able to build part of his house.  He is a very honest man.

He is requesting a loan to be able to finish his house.  Christmas is approaching, and his wife told him to do everything possible so that they are able to have a good day on this unforgettable date.

His dream is for the house to be finished.

loans.use: to purchase cement and blocks.

loans.name: Cornelio Elias

texts.es:
Cornelio, desea continuar trabajando con financiamientos, por tal razón esta solicitando un préstamo para  la compra de insumos agrícolas, como lo son abono, herbicidas para aplicarlos al cultivo, esta compra le ayudara a mejorar su siembra y con la esperanza que los cultivos sean abundantes.
Cornelio es un agricultor quien a traves de los prestamos logra realizar los cultivos, por esta situacion cada vez que inicia esta labor, solicita su financiamiento, seindo una persona responsable para el pago al vencimiento.
texts.en:
Cornelio would like to continue working with loans. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to buy farming supplies such as fertilizer and herbicides to apply to his crops.  This purchase will help him to improve his sowing and hopefully his crops will grow abundantly.

Cornelio is a farmer who, through loans, manages to grow his crops.  Each time he starts his sowing, he requests a loan.  He is a responsible person who makes his repayments on the due date.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and herbicides

loans.name: Baronesa Bionet

texts.es:
En la ciudadela El Progreso de la ciudad de Portoviejo se reúne cada quince días el Banco Comunal Girasoles, esta es una zona urbano marginal muy poblada en esta ciudad, se la conoce como el sector de la cárcel ya que en esta zona queda la cárcel de mujeres de Portoviejo.

En este lugar conocimos a la señora Baronesa. Tiene 63 años de edad, está soltera pero de una relación que tuvo hace muchos años tuvo tres hijos los mismos que ya  son mayores de edad, el menor de ellos aun vive con ella.

Ella para ganarse el sustento diario desde hace varios años tiene una pequeña panadería donde además de pan fabrica y vende deliciosos pasteles. Trabaja todos los días desde las  5h00 en el horneando el pan el mismo que desde el dia anterior deja preparado para el dia siguiente, vende en su pequeño local y también entrega a una fundación todos los fines de semana.

Este crédito es para comprar harina, mantequilla, huevos, levadura y otros productos necesarios para la fabricación del pan y sus pasteles. Es socia fundadora del Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los créditos le ayudan a mejorar su  negocio.
 
Su sueño es formar una microempresa de fabricación de pasteles.
texts.en:
Every two weeks the 'Girasoles' (Sunflowers) community bank meets in El Progreso neighborhood, in the city of Portoviejo.  This is a very densely populated, poor, urban area of the city.  It is known as 'Sector de la Cárcel' (Prison Sector) because it is home to Portoviejo's women's prison.

Here we meet Baronesa.  She is 63 years old and single but has three children from a relationship that she had many years ago.  Her children are grown up but her youngest still lives with her.

In order to earn a living, Baronesa has been running a small bakery for several years.  As well as making bread, she also makes and sells delicious cakes.  She works every day, from 5.00am, baking bread which she prepares the day before.  She sells from her small premises and also delivers to an establishment every weekend.

Baronesa will use this loan to buy flour, butter, eggs, yeast and other products she needs for making bread and cakes.  She is a founding member of her community bank and she likes it because the loans help her to improve her business.  Her dream is to set up a cake-making micro business.

loans.use: to buy flour, butter, eggs, yeast, etc.

loans.name: Julio Alberto

texts.es:
Julio, se ha decidido por otro préstamo para la compra de CD Y DVDS, ya que quiere adquirir un nuevo lote de mercadería, para surtir y mejorar la atención  a los clientes.
El préstamo anterior fue una gran ayuda para aumentar el inventario y mantener lo nuevo en música y películas, esta inversiones le han traído beneficios no solo para el sino también para la familia, ya que sus ventas aumentaron y puede ofrecer a la clientela lo nuevo en musica y peliculas.
texts.en:
Julio has decided to take out another loan to buy CDs and DVDs, since he wants to acquire a new lot of merchandise for stock and to improve his customer service.
